description:
testing: print test results to standard output

Errors in the code under test go to standard output.
Errors in testing or its usage go to standard error.

messages.text:
LGTM except for the ^%&^%& typing corrector messing with my comments

http://codereview.appspot.com/5374090/diff/1008/src/pkg/testing/example.go
File src/pkg/testing/example.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5374090/diff/1008/src/pkg/testing/example.go#newcode30
src/pkg/testing/example.go:30: fmt.Fprintf(stdout, "--- FAIL: %s\npanic: %v\n", eg.Name, e)
surely Printf will do. or did you mean stderr (i think not).

great. now some %$%& daemon is changing stderr to std err every time i type it (including both in this sentence). WTF

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5da2d686d6bb ***

testing: print test results to standard output

Errors in the code under test go to standard output.
Errors in testing or its usage go to standard error.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5374090

Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5374090: testing: print test results to standard output
